text: Hey team, looking to work with Andrew Clark for Grill'd. Budget is approx $3,469 - need 1 x 60-second YouTube video, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x Product photography, 1 x Press release quote. 6 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 11 months. Start date: November 2025.
